name: Star Doll Makeover - Girl Games for kids
name_original: Star Doll Makeover - Girl Games for kids
description:
Every girl wants to look pretty, beautiful and fashion like a star. This exciting game lets you try some awesome makeup style and choose fashion clothes. It's up to you to make the girl a fashionista. Use your creativity and your makeup skills to make her more fashionable and beautiful.

Features:
•Click the shoes to open the shoe closet and choose a pair of perfect shoes for her.
•Click the dress to open the clothes closet and choose a gorgeous outfit for her.
•Add accessories, including bags, jewelry and tiara
•Choose fashionable hairstyles.
